title: Happy Andrew Cuomo Day! | Guests: Rep. Michael McCaul & Spencer Lindquist | 8/4/21
description:
Glenn, Stu, and Pat discuss New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo’s sexual harassment accusations. Stu goes through the report in detail and shares what he thinks is the worst accusation. Rep. Michael McCaul joins to discuss a new report that found some suspicious activity from the Wuhan lab. Glenn and Pat rant about CNN’s fearmongering coverage of the Delta variant. CNN’s Chris Cuomo was mentioned in his brother’s sexual harassment investigation, and it’s not good. The Federalist’s Spencer Lindquist calls in to discuss his article exposing the Left’s pedophilia problem. New Mexico will now hold gas stations accountable if a drunk person buys their gas.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
